Articles.Content: Floor 73: the MCP, who oversees everything in the building.

Floor 74

A cheetah who speaks only in rhyme.

75

A machine which spontaneously creates and destroys mini universes.
76. The world's tallest building!
77. Godzilla is fighting King Kong.....again.

78.TARDIS

10char
79: You step in the TARDIS and The Doctor flies you to floor 79
80. UH-Oh cybermen's conversion floor quick next floor.
Floor 81. Luminous squared dancing floor, 70s style, with John Travolta crying because he rip off his pants.

Floor 82: Daft Punk DJ-ing the dance one floor below; this floor has an opening down into floor 81 taking up most of the room, with a giant (how's a 3 meter diameter for ya?) disco ball suspended from the ceiling.
Floor 83: generator and capacitor bank to power the whole building. (partly due to floors 81and 82.)
Floor 84: You see a time bomb counting down, better hurry to the next floor!
Floor 85: Aperature Science HQ
86. You find Major Tom from David Bowie's song "Space Oddity".

Floor 87:

Nothing to see here, just some walls.
Floor 88: UNDER CONSTRUCTION

Floor 89: Police investigation scene, continue upwards please.

(It appears Jeb duct taped Billy-Bobzor Kerman to an SRB and the ceiling is made from 5ft thick steel. I wonder what that burn mark is...)

Floor 90.

This is now a 5-star building, (sim tower reference)

Floor 91.

Please go to this floor, many of you like it

It has cake.
Floor 92. THE CAKE IS A LIE!
Floor 93: 93 holographic cakes. Oh, and GLaDOS is there too.
94: A Creeper, which immediately explodes and sends you flying to floor 95
Floor 95: A carton of ex-lax chocolates. And you're already very hungry since you haven't eaten since Floor 1.
Floor 96: A Resturant
Floor 97: A great Bookfort that the greatest.
